workExperience.responsibilities: In this role, I have undertaken assignments at Apoteket AB in Östersund, Leksand, Säffle, and Karlstad, as well as at ApoEx in Stockholm. At ApoEx, I have been involved in the final quality control before the delivery of orders.

I have been stationed at pharmacies in Krokom, Änge, Östersund, Bräcke, Sunne, Forshaga, and Karlstad. In addition to my pharmaceutical duties, I have also been involved in inventory management, campaigns, revisions, and training newly hired employees.

education.details: Currently enrolled in a full-stack .NET training program, specializing in the creation and maintenance of web and enterprise applications. The program emphasizes C# programming, backend development, and database management, while also providing skills in frontend development with JavaScript.
In addition to the regular courses, I opted for a course in Geriatric Pharmacotherapy. Furthermore, I pursued additional studies in Pharmacognosy beyond the program requirements.
